SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.cli.controller

Class SetupState

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.cli.controller.ClientState
IS24_LB11.cli.controller.SetupState
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerStateInterface
public class SetupState extends ClientState implements PlayerStateInterface
The SetupState class represents the state of the client during the game setup phase. It handles server events, user commands, and various input methods.

      public SetupState(LobbyState lobbyState, PlayerSetup setup, Table table)
      Constructs a new SetupState with the specified LobbyState, PlayerSetup, and Table.
      Parameters:
      lobbyState - the previous lobby state.
      setup - the player setup details.
      table - the table instance for the game.

    • SetupState

      public SetupState(ViewHub viewHub, PlayerSetup setup, Table table) throws IOException
      Constructs a new SetupState with the specified ViewHub, PlayerSetup, and Table.
      Parameters:
      viewHub - the view hub used for managing views and stages.
      setup - the player setup details.
      table - the table instance for the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
